Class ClientLargeComponentPrinter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.formatters.ClientLargeComponentPrinter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientComponentVisitor
public class ClientLargeComponentPrinter extends Object implements ClientComponentVisitor
Formatter that builds a string matrix displaying a large ClientComponent tile.
